titleStmt.title: A declaration and representation from the forces of the northern associations to his Excellencie, Sir Thomas Fairfax. And by him presented to the Parliament, June the 12th. 1647.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Benson, and are to be sold at his shop in Chancery Lane neer the Rouls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Chancery Lane neer the Rouls
